title: Punch and Mobile & web access activation
content: Account activation and accessFor managersTo find out more about your access, we suggest the article Manager profile: My accessesTo find out your rights as a Manager, please refer to the article Description of roles and access of the ManagerFor the employeesYour employees can have access to the Emprez application via the employee Employee portal or on the Mobile application (available on Apple or Android).This application will allow them to have access to their schedules, punch their presence, request, and exchange from their shift, send you messages, sign documents ... Discover all their access rights by clicking here.We invite you to discover the article Employee access to the mobile application and punch to activate this function and to know where to find the users' codes and passwords.You will then be able to provide your employees with: The Employee user manual, which will show you the functionality of Emprez, in particular how to punch for a shift.Related articles:Type of employee access to the punch: Physical punch or mobile punchEmployee punch access code for punching on the punch machineDescription of the options for the interface of the employee account with the punch - Model V1Description of the options for the interface of the employee account with the punch - Model V2Helpful?00Updated: 4 years ago Share :
